keyTakeaways: System prompts are the highest leverage point in custom agent engineering
Default agents carry ~15 unnecessary tools that waste context window space
Custom tools bridge deterministic code execution with conversational AI
In-memory MCP servers eliminate infrastructure overhead for tool packaging
Agent progression: Better agents → More agents → Custom agents
Context window efficiency becomes critical constraint as systems scale
Production agents require security controls, model selection, and monitoring
audienceLevel: Advanced engineers building custom AI agents
estimatedROI: High - reduces context costs, increases specialization, enables scaling
